title: Add information about Solr 4.0 Cookbook to https://lucene.apache.org/solr/
description: I think it would be good to have the information about new version of Cookbook available. Now the question is, how it is currently handled after moving away from Apache Forrest to the new site based on CMS.

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content:
Hi Rafał, some information on editing the site is here: http://lucene.apache.org/site-instructions.html - those instructions assume commit privileges, though.

My suggestion: produce a patch and put it here.

Note that anonymous edits using the CMS bookmarklet are sent to the dev@ list as a kind of pull request.  I'm fairly sure your edits will be more substantial than this method will comfortably support, though.

comments.author: Rafał Kuć
comments.content: Attaching a patch and a cover for the book. The cover is 150px x 180px so it should be OK.

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content: Rafał, I committed your patch, added the cover image, and removed the 3.1 cookbook cover image - I can see it on the production site now.
